channel.title: CVE Feed for The Curl Project -- curl:
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Curl Project -- curl:

item.title: CVE-2018-16839|2024-08-05T10:32:54.082Z -- the%20curl%20project -- curl%3A
item.description: Curl versions 7.33.0 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a buffer overrun in the SASL authentication code that may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2018-16842|2024-08-05T10:32:54.082Z -- the%20curl%20project -- curl%3A
item.description: Curl versions 7.14.1 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read in the tool_msgs.c:voutf() function that may result in information exposure and denial of service.
